laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: C. difficile nucleic acid amplification assay
laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile. (Reference Range-Negative)
1.5 cm nodule in the lower pole of the left thyroid gland.
Multiple hypodense lesions in the liver, characterized as cysts. The largest lesion measures 4.1 cm in segment II. Subcentimeter hepatic lesions are too small to characterize.
